comments.author: korkycat
comments.body: I am posting a link to a blockchain bootstrap folder, for anyone installig the core wallet.It is up to date as of April  6 2024.This will save time downloading the blockchain.I think SMX will be more promoted this year, and should attract a new valuation.Here is the folder link  -  https://drive.google.com/file/d/18pLGfNrKEuzCCBl1mJIq8iLQ0tZZHBby/view?usp=sharingGood luck!

comments.author: falekp
comments.body: Quote from: korkycat on April 07, 2024, 05:07:17 PMI am posting a link to a blockchain bootstrap folder, for anyone installig the core wallet.It is up to date as of April  6 2024.This will save time downloading the blockchain.I think SMX will be more promoted this year, and should attract a new valuation.Here is the folder link  -  https://drive.google.com/file/d/18pLGfNrKEuzCCBl1mJIq8iLQ0tZZHBby/view?usp=sharingGood luck!  I still don't know if a halving is planned, changing the algorithm? As for the valuation, mining does not cover 1/10 of the electricity costs, which is why there is so little interest in smx mining. So I'll ask if there is any investor or any talks on this subject? Will someone speak up?
